text: Va Alloh taolo ʙarxe az sumoro ʙar ʙarxe [digar] dar [ne'matu] ruzi ʙartari dodast; pas, kasone, ki ʙartari doda sudaand, hozir nestand, ki az ruzii xud ʙa ʙardagonason ʙidihand, to hamagi dar on [ne'matu doroi] ʙaroʙar savand. [Agar xud az sarik ʙezorand, caro ʙaroi Alloh taolo sarik qaror medihand?] Pas, ojo [ʙo in sirkvarzi] ne'mati Allohro inkor mekunand
